sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Add requirements to apply_once</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var REQUIREMENT_IDS = [
	'2b80f2d1c4511010fa9b244eacc39b93',
	'2fd5ecd61b795810e9164153cc4bcb99',
	'239c130b6c211010fa9b53988ab34a3a',
	'de3151dac1111010fa9b0669111834d0',
	'25ccd5eb4d131010fa9bfb0fc87267fa'
];

REQUIREMENT_IDS.forEach(function (requirementId) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_requirement');
	if (gr.get(requirementId)) {
		var filename = 'sn_imt_core_health_and_safety_requirement_' + requirementId + '.xml';
		gs.info(filename + ' already installed -- do not apply again');
		sn_applyonce.ApplyOnce.doNotUpdate(filename);
	}
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-30 21:19:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>56e779c679af1010fa9b168118f0dba6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add requirements to apply_once</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">fbd1bfe445b01010fa9b7ec6c81d77ce</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_56e779c679af1010fa9b168118f0dba6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-04 00:02:07</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
